step.description: Happy path: Convert a local HTML file to Markdown. Validates file reading and HTML preprocessing.
Edge case: Attempt to convert a non-HTML file (e.g., PDF) to Markdown. Tests fallback behavior for unsupported formats.

step.description: Happy path: Convert a base64-encoded data URI to Markdown. Validates decoding and conversion of embedded HTML.
Edge case: Test with an invalid content type. Should return a ValueError.
Edge case: Attempt to convert a non-existent file. Should return FileNotFoundError.
Edge case: Test handling of malformed data URI. Should raise a ValueError due to incorrect format.
Edge case: Attempt to convert a binary file (e.g., image) treated as text. Should trigger UnicodeDecodeError or graceful fallback.
Edge case: Test performance and memory handling on large files.
